Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Palais des Congres de Paris and close to Arc de Triomphe. This 4-star hotel is close to Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 950 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands. This hotel also features a hair salon, shopping on site, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Palais des Congres de Paris and close to Arc de Triomphe. This 4-star hotel is close to Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palais des Congres de Paris - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Bois de Boulogne - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Espace Champerret - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Place Charles de Gaulle Etoile - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Arc de Triomphe - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Jardin d'Acclimatation - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Lido - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Luis Vuitton Foundation Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Baccarat Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Parc Monceau - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Guimet Museum - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Jacquemart-Andre Museum - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Paris Museum of Modern Art - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Place du Trocadero - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Palais de Chaillot - 2 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 25 km / 15.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
